pages.text: Ancient writings tell of a sticky mushroom called $(o)Hygrocybe reidii$() that exudes a honey-like substance. However, this seems to have died out a long time ago.
This mushroom consists of multiple sticky stems and caps with an orange color.

pages.title: Harvesting
pages.text: The cap of adult Honey Waxcap exudes small drops of a honey-like substance that can be harvested.$(br2)The cap's solid structure is reminiscent of honeycombs, parts of which can be removed.

pages.title: Slowness
pages.text: It is edible and the stickyness of the Honey Waxcap allows you to make potions and tipped arrows of slowness from them.
